choices.text:
write a python function to filter out the empty strings in a list of strings.
Here's one way you can write this Python code: 
```python
def remove_empty(strings): 
    return [string for string in strings if len(string) > 0] # use list comprehension and filter() function to return only non-empty strings from the original lists of all possible combinations.  This will create a new filtered List object that contains exactly those elements which have length greater than zero, effectively removing any empty or null values
```
